issue.title: mud_box, mud_atlas models not automatically loaded in 2.6

content.raw: Works now with brian's hack that has the starting_pen download mud_box ... you just need to remove starting_pen from .gazebo/models in order for gazebo to re-download the starting pen and hence trigger downloading mud_box ...
content.html: Works now with brian's hack that has the starting_pen download mud_box ... you just need to remove starting_pen from .gazebo/models in order for gazebo to re-download the starting pen and hence trigger downloading mud_box ...
